title: Topic 001 Question 029
body: An application is processing clickstream data using Amazon Kinesis. The clickstream data feed into Kinesis experiences periodic spikes. The PutRecords API call occasionally fails and the logs show that the failed call returns the response shown below:
/Amazon AWS Certified Developer - Associate DVA-C02 Exam Practice Questions/img/image1
Which techniques will help mitigate this exception? (Choose two.)
options: Use a PutRecord API instead of PutRecords.
Reduce the frequency and/or size of the requests.
Use Amazon SNS instead of Kinesis.
Reduce the number of KCL consumers.
